The '''Rite of Profane Ascension''' was an evil, ancient [[ritual]] that allowed a [[Vampire|vampiric]] being to amplify its strengths and shed its weaknesses (such as sunlight hypersensitivity).

Description.History: The origins of the rite were lost in time. As of {{Yearlink|1492}}, the only being to know the details of it was the [[archdevil]] [[Mephistopheles]], who, in the 13{{th}} century [[DR]], brokered an [[infernal contract]] with the [[vampire lord]] [[Cazador Szarr]]. Likewise, Cazador was the only vampire known by name to attempt performing the ritual.
